John D. Heintz wrote:
> 
> 
> How about LEASE with a timeout, followed by DELETE?
> 
> If the client goes *poof*, the timeout would cleanup reservation and
> return the message to the queue.

My problem with a lease it that it would make it harder to say formal 
things about a protocol that used it.

cheers
Bill
